```{r, include = F}
harm_dat <- read.csv(file.path(root_path, "Data Harmonization/Data Clean/harmonized_dataset.csv"), na = "")
wd_notes <- read.csv(file.path(root_path, "RPC2/Data Clean/enrollment_notes_021825.csv"), na = "")

rpc2 <- harm_dat %>%
  dplyr::summarise(across(where(negate(is.numeric)), ~ ifelse(all(is.na(.x)), NA_character_, last(na.omit(.x)))),
                   across(where(is.numeric), ~ ifelse(all(is.na(.x)), NA_real_, mean(.x, na.rm = TRUE))),
                   .by = c(record_id, visit)) %>%
  filter(study == "RPC2") %>%
  left_join(wd_notes) %>%
  filter(is.na(enroll_notes) | enroll_notes == "Completed Study")
```

# Demographics
```{r, message=F, warning=F, echo=F}
# demographics
demo <- rpc2 %>%
  dplyr::select(record_id, visit, consent_date, dob, sex, race, ethnicity, participation_status) %>%
  filter(visit == "baseline")

demo_missing <- demo %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c(record_id, visit),
    names_to = "missing_var",
    values_to = "value"
  ) %>%
  filter(is.na(value)) %>%
  select(record_id, visit, missing_var)
kable(table(demo_missing$record_id, demo_missing$visit))
kable(demo_missing)
```

* RPC-45 also missing race, ethnicity, phone number

# Medical History

```{r, message=F, warning=F, echo=F}

med_history_missing <- med_history %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c(record_id, visit),
    names_to = "missing_var",
    values_to = "value"
  ) %>%
  filter(is.na(value)) %>%

kable(table(med_history_missing$record_id, med_history_missing$visit))
```

* RPC-45 missing ALL medical history

# Vitals

```{r, message=F, warning=F, echo=F}

vitals_missing <- vitals %>%

  ) %>%
  filter(is.na(value)) %>%
  select(record_id, visit, missing_var)
kable(table(vitals_missing$record_id, vitals_missing$visit))
kable(vitals_missing)
```

# Kidney Biopsies


```{r, message=F, warning=F, echo=F}
# kidney biopsies
bx <- rpc2 %>%
  dplyr::select(record_id, visit, baseline_bx, followup_bx, kit_id, glut_id, form_id,
       rnalater_id, cryomold_id, cryostor_id,
       kidney_side, kidney_length, kidney_location, passes_attempt,
       pass1_time, pass1_core_cm, pass1_cortex_cm, pass1_core_spec,
       pass2_time, pass2_core_cm, pass2_cortex_cm, pass2_core_spec,
       pass3_time, pass3_core_cm, pass3_cortex_cm, pass3_core_spec,
       pass4_time, pass4_core_cm, pass4_cortex_cm, pass4_core_spec,
       core_diagnostic, diagnostic_pass, diagnostic_formalin_time,
       diagnostic_glut_time, core_oct, oct_pass, oct_time,
       core_hypo_cryo, cryo_hypo_pass, hypo_time, cryo_time,
       core_rna, rna_pass, rna_time
) %>%
  filter((visit %in% c("baseline") & baseline_bx == "y") | (visit %in% c("post_treatment") & followup_bx == "y") )

bx_missing <- bx %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c(record_id,visit), 
    names_to = "missing_var",
    values_to = "is_missing",
    values_transform = list(is_missing = is.na)
  ) %>%
  filter(is_missing) %>%
  select(record_id, visit, missing_var)
kable(table(bx_missing$record_id, bx_missing$visit))
kable(bx_missing)
```

# RCT

```{r, message=F, warning=F, echo=F}
# rct
rct <- rpc2 %>%
  dplyr::select(record_id, visit, pah_raw, pah_sd, pah_cv,
       gfr_raw_plasma_urine, gfr_bsa_plasma_urine, erpf_raw_plasma_urine,
       erpf_bsa_plasma_urine, gfr_raw_plasma, gfr_bsa_plasma,
       erpf_raw_plasma, erpf_bsa_plasma, pah_bsa_plasma_urine,
       pah_clear_bsa, pah_clear_abs
) %>%
  filter(visit %in% c("baseline", "post_treatment"))

rct_missing <- rct %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c(record_id,visit), 
    names_to = "missing_var",
    values_to = "is_missing",
    values_transform = list(is_missing = is.na)
  ) %>%
  filter(is_missing) %>%
  select(record_id, visit, missing_var)
kable(table(rct_missing$record_id, rct_missing$visit))
kable(rct_missing)
```
